document_metadata.title: Rocket Mortgage Credit Upgrade Referral - Constructive Denial Analysis
document_metadata.primary_purpose: Document constructive denial through Credit Upgrade Department referral and quantify damages

fcra_sections.1681e(b): Reasonable procedures to assure maximum possible accuracy
fcra_sections.1681s-2(a): Furnishers' duty to provide accurate information

denial_details.denial_type: Constructive denial via Credit Upgrade Department referral

timeline_context.event: Credit score of 684 documented during active bankruptcy

timeline_context.significance: Legal elimination of debts, should improve creditworthiness
71 days post-discharge, constructive denial due to false reporting

causation_analysis.but_for_causation: But for the false reporting, score would have been above 640 requirement

ongoing_harm.deferred_repairs: Garage replacement and critical home improvements

consumer_qualification_indicators: Willingness to pay $737 for required repairs

constructive_denial_elements.legal_significance: Constructive denial has same FCRA implications as outright denial
constructive_denial_elements.pattern_evidence: Part of systematic exclusion from credit markets post-discharge

emotional_impact: Marital stress from financial limitations and hidden shame
Social withdrawal due to inability to participate in activities
Health deterioration including stress-related weight gain
Career impacts from reduced professional confidence
Housing instability as needed repairs were deferred

fcra_violations_demonstrated.description: 13 creditors failed to maintain reasonable procedures for accuracy
fcra_violations_demonstrated.harm_caused: 84-point credit score drop enabling constructive denial

fcra_violations_demonstrated.description: Bureaus failed to conduct reasonable reinvestigation of disputed information
fcra_violations_demonstrated.harm_caused: Continued false reporting despite discharge evidence

fcra_violations_demonstrated.description: Furnishers continued providing inaccurate information post-discharge
fcra_violations_demonstrated.harm_caused: Systematic suppression of credit score below lending thresholds

quantified_damages.opportunity_costs: Lost consolidation benefits and market-rate financing
quantified_damages.intangible_harms: Marital, social, health, and career impacts

strategic_significance.causation_clarity: Clear but-for relationship between false reporting and denial
strategic_significance.damages_quantified: Specific monthly and annual financial harm documented
willfulness_indicators: Post-discharge timing shows knowledge of discharge
strategic_significance.case_value_contribution: Establishes clear causation chain from violations to quantified damages
